summary: The shy son of an aging comedienne tries to find a balance between his demanding home life, his new girlfriend, and his mother's second chance at fame.
cast: Brenda Blethyn|Rebecca Gibney|Khan Chittenden|Richard Wilson|Russell Dykstra|Emma Booth|Katie Wall|Philip Quast|Frankie J. title: Clubland
